comments.content:
"GUR" must be **[Makimango](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818151116/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Makimango%20-%20Regular&fid=f6355d4b75f5722f6da1d246caf9320a&fsize=60&text=GURREN&fit=1)** shareware font by Claes Kallarsson (FuelFonts, 2000)  
"EN" look either customized or set in a different font

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818151116/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
